name: Google LLC
details: Google LLC is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, which include online advertising technologies, a search engine, cloud computing, software, and hardware.

jobPost.name: Software Engineer
jobPost.description: We are looking for a talented software engineer to join our team and help us build the next generation of Google products. The ideal candidate will have experience with a variety of programming languages and a passion for creating high-quality, scalable software.
jobPost.requirements: Bachelor's or higher degree in Computer Science or related field, experience with programming languages such as Java, C++, Python, and JavaScript, experience with distributed systems and/or cloud computing, excellent communication skills

name: Netflix
details: Netflix, Inc. is an American over-the-top content platform and production company headquartered in Los Gatos, California.

jobPost.name: Content Analyst

name: Marvel Entertainment, LLC
details: Marvel Entertainment, LLC is an American entertainment company that is a subsidiary of Walt Disney Studios.

name: Tesla
details: Tesla, Inc. is an American electric vehicle and clean energy company based in Palo Alto, California.

jobPost.name: Hardware Engineer
jobPost.description: We are seeking a talented Hardware Engineer to join our team and help us design and develop cutting-edge hardware solutions for our electric vehicles. The ideal candidate will have experience in hardware engineering and a passion for sustainable transportation.

name: Amazon.com
details: Amazon.com, Inc. is an American multinational technology company based in Seattle, Washington. It is primarily focused on e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and artificial intelligence.

name: Facebook

jobPost.name: Product Manager
